song_lyrics: Re Puruṣhottam bolyā prīte, kahu chhu sarve sāmbhaḷo ek chīte... Re Puruṣhottam° ṭek
Re satya kahu chhu narnārī, re jem chhe tem kahu vistārī;
Emā khoṭī na maḷe lagārī... Re Puruṣhottam° 1
Re samajāvu kahī draṣhṭānte, re jathārath hoye tem kahu khānte;
Māru rūp jem chhe tem bhānte... Re Puruṣhottam° 2
Re pakṣhī ūḍe jem ākāshe, re deh sahit bole hāse;
Anant evā jāye āve bhāse... Re Puruṣhottam° 3
Re vādaḷ vījaḷī ne vāri, re vāyughaṭā shobhe sārī;
Saunī ākṛuti nyārī nyārī... Re Puruṣhottam° 4
Re shūnyamāhī sahu samāve, re hime te jem nīr jamāve;
title: Re Puruṣhottam bolyā prīte

metadata.kirtan_info:
1-448: Sadguru Premanand Swami

Category: Updeshna Pad
